medical_history.chief_complaint: Moderate right lower quadrant abdominal pain and fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced an acute episode of abdominal pain approximately 2 weeks ago that resolved after being diagnosed with viral gastroenteritis. Today, she reports moderate pain in the right lower quadrant and fevers for approximately 2 days. She has had normal bowel movements and no hematochezia or melena.
